opencastR 0.0.2
  • Reference

Query Opencast for a specific events metadata

Source: R/oc_event_metadata.R
oc_event_metadata.Rd

Returns the event's metadata of the specified type.

oc_event_metadata(eventId = "", type = "")

Arguments

eventId

The event id
type

The type of metadata to get

Value

Returns the event's metadata of the specified type.

Details

This function expects the hostname, username and password to be set as environment variables.

Examples

Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_HOST = "https://legacy.opencast.org")
Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_USERNAME = "admin")
Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_PASSWORD = "opencast")

oc_event_metadata("91df4c57-9631-4a84-b814-d8e9b36a3c32")
#> $content
